question: Employer or Union Retiree Plans
text:
Employer or Union Retiree Plans
          
        
Plans that provide health and/or drug coverage to former employees or members, and, in some cases, their families. These plans are offered to people through their (or a spouse's) former employer or employee organization. Many of these plans aren't legally required to meet many of the provisions of the
Affordable Care Act
, including providing coverage for children up to age 26.
